text: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters is an 2007 animated movie based on the Adult Swim program Aqua Teen Hunger Force. The movie is rated R for crude and sexual humor, violent images, and language. The movie was written and directed by the show's creators Dave Willis and Matt Maiellaro. ==Plot== The Aqua Teens, Carl, the Plutonians, the Cybernetic Ghost, Dr. Weird, and the Mooninites are all after the exercise machine called the Insanenoflex. Carl goes on it and gets stuck, so the Aqua Teens try to stop it with music. The plan works, but the Aqua Teens realize that the world is still in danger, and then they set out to find more about themselves. Later on the Aqua Teens find out how they were created by Dr. Weird. Also they learn that there was a fourth Aqua Teen called Chicken Bittle. Finally they learn that their father turns out to be a watermelon whose accomplice is Neil Peart of the band Rush and that their mother is a 9-layer burrito. ==Cast== Name Character(s) Dave Willis Carl Meatwad Ignignokt Dana Snyder Master Shake Carey Means Frylock C. Martin Croker Dr. Weird Steve Matt Maiellaro Cybernetic Ghost Err Satan Andy Merrill Oglethorpe Mike Schatz Emory mc chris MC Pee Pants George Lowe Space Ghost Bruce Campbell Chicken Bittle Chris Kattan Walter Melon Neil Peart himself Matt Harrigan Linda Craig Hartin Rob Goldstein ==Planned sequel== A script for a sequel entitled Death Fighter has been written. The project was scrapped and never produced. Co-creator Dave Willis has stated he would be open to using Kickstarter to fund the project in the future. ==References== Category:Aqua Teen Hunger Force Category:2007 movies Category:American animated movies Category:2007 animated movies
title: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
